description:
Designed for mountain bikers who go hard in the backcountry or the bikepark. Dedicated compression construction for all-day comfort in modern MTB shoes.

  • Made of polypropylene, spandex and NanoGlide anti-friction nylon that reduces hotspots and chafing
  • Compression fit provides ankle and arch support
  • Low-profile padding in the forefoot reduces toe bang while descending
  • Tight knit 6 in. tall cuff protects your ankle
name: Dissent Labs MTB Supercrew Comp. Nano 6in. Socks - Unisex
